heading: IChibaOne SaaS Products ecosystem

commerceLayer.heading: Commerce Layer
commerceLayer.subTitle: Multi-channel, multi-market order management, from online to offline.
list: Seamless integration with selling channels as Amazon, Walmart, Wayfair, Shopee, selling website, etc.
Manage inventory from multiple warehouses in multiple markets.
Distribute order the the most appropriate locations to optimize deliver time and cost.
Manage product information on multiple sales channels, update and synchronize batch data.
Manage physical stores, sync inventory data with other stores in real-time.
Connect with hundreds of international ecommerces to crawl products and import it into your selling website.

crawler.heading: Crawler
crawler.subTitle: Crawl product data from international ecommerce sites to your selling websites or applications.
list: Connect with various international ecommerce sites from Japan, Korea, China, the US and Southeast Asia: Amazon, eBay, Rakuten, Mercari, Taobao, Gmart, etc.
Create product collections based on keywords, catalogs, and so on from source pages.
Monitor sellers, black-list product, and keyword list to ensure the best shopping experience for customers.

pos.heading: POS
pos.title: Point of Sale
pos.subTitle: Embrace our customized Point of Sale software to give your retail business unimaginable growth.
list: Integrated payment processing & mobile check out.
Customer relationship management for personalizing communications & customer service.
Gift cards that work online and in-store so customers can redeem everywhere.
Flexible order fulfillment options allow customers to receive orders in a way that’s convenient for them.

storeFront.heading: StoreFront Layer
storeFront.title: StoreFront Layer
storeFront.subTitle: Extending your retail business to online sales was quick and easy with our fully customizable website builder.
list: Build a new eCommerce website from scratch.
Add unlimited products to your online stores.
Seamlessly integrate Saas ecosystem for A-Z sales process.
Simple and easy website management.

ship4P.heading: Ship4P
ship4P.subTitle: Multi-carrier shipping management, purchase shipping labels with good rates.
list: Easily connect and manage multiple shipping companies without having to sign contract with each of them.
Purchase official shipping labels, ensure smooth transportation with no risks.
Track shipment numbers from multiple carriers on one screen without visiting their websites.

smartCrossBorder.heading: Cross–Border Forwarding
smartCrossBorder.subTitle: An import-export management software that saves up to 40% of time with automated document generation.
list: Automatically generate invoices, packing lists, and manifests.
Manage documents until packages are successfully cleared through customs.
Track the status of orders in the warehouse, from inbound, storage, to outbound.

wms.heading: WMS
wms.subTitle: Boost your warehouse performance, tailored for multi-channel operations.
list: Control the entire warehouse operation
Manage multiple warehouse on multiple markets.
Update product data in real-time. Suggest the best way to handle orders to save time.
Make inventory plan based on historical data and AI.

invoice.heading: Pricing, Invoice & Billings
invoice.subTitle: Manage financial workflows of your ecommerce business to secure transparency.
list: Manage invoices and transactions from multiple sales channels and payment gateways.
Identify pricing types to cater all pricing models required by merchants.
Keep an eye on income and outcome sources for accuracy reports.

integration.heading: Integration
integration.subTitle: Seamlessly integrate with 3rd-party software and sales channels to help cross-border sellers operate their businesses smoothly.
list: Effortlessly connect with 30+ sales channels across the USA, Japan, and Vietnam, enabling centralized order management.
Integrate with third-party solutions like accounting, ERP, and 3PL fulfillment to optimize your sales operations.
Instantly access 100+ shipping partners to support both domestic and international sellers.
